remarks: Define a builder for an 'almost everywhere' relation between functions, from relations between function values.  In this definition, the range of ` f ` and ` g ` is enforced in order to ensure the resulting relation is a set.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
statement:
df-fae $p |- ~ae = ( r e. _V , m e. U. ran measures |-> { <. f , g >. | ( ( f e. ( dom r ^m U. dom m ) /\ g e. ( dom r ^m U. dom m ) ) /\ { x e. U. dom m | ( f ` x ) r ( g ` x ) } ae m ) } ) $.
$d f g m r x $.
